CampaignId.description: The unique identifier of the campaign to which the ad group belongs.

AccountId.description: The unique identifier of the account to which the ad group belongs.

CustomerId.description: The unique identifier of the customer to which the ad group belongs.

AdRotation.description: Defines how ads are rotated within the ad group.

EndDate.description: The end date for the ad rotation period.

StartDate.description: The start date for the ad rotation period.

Type.description: The type of ad rotation strategy being used.

AudienceAdsBidAdjustment.description: The bid adjustment for audience-based ads.

BiddingScheme.description: The bidding strategy used for the ad group.

Type.description: The type of bidding strategy being used.

InheritedBidStrategyType.description: The inherited bid strategy type from the parent campaign.

CpcBid.description: The cost-per-click bid for the ad group.

Amount.description: The amount of the cost-per-click bid.

CpvBid.description: The cost-per-view bid for the ad group.

Amount.description: The amount of the cost-per-view bid.

CpmBid.description: The cost-per-thousand-impressions bid for the ad group.

Amount.description: The amount of the cost-per-thousand-impressions bid.

EndDate.description: The end date of the ad group.

Day.description: The day part of the end date.

Month.description: The month part of the end date.

Year.description: The year part of the end date.

FinalUrlSuffix.description: A string to append to the final URL.

ForwardCompatibilityMap.description: A map of key-value pairs for forward compatibility.

key.description: The key of the compatibility pair.

value.description: The value of the compatibility pair.

Id.description: The unique identifier of the ad group.

Language.description: The language targeting setting for the ad group.

Name.description: The name of the ad group.

Network.description: The network targeting setting for the ad group.

PrivacyStatus.description: The privacy status of the ad group.

Settings.description: The settings associated with the ad group.

StartDate.description: The start date of the ad group.

Day.description: The day part of the start date.

Month.description: The month part of the start date.

Year.description: The year part of the start date.

Status.description: The status of the ad group.

TrackingUrlTemplate.description: The tracking URL template for the ad group.

key.description: The key of the custom parameter.

value.description: The value of the custom parameter.

AdScheduleUseSearcherTimeZone.description: Indicates whether ad scheduling uses the searcher's time zone.

AdGroupType.description: The type of the ad group (e.g., Search, Display, Video, etc).

MultimediaAdsBidAdjustment.description: The bid adjustment for multimedia ads.
